DOC.brief_summary: Thrombotic biomarkers angiographic characteristic compare among de novo patient central serous chorioretinopathy ( CSC ) , polypoidal choroidal vasculopathy ( PCV ) control .
DOC.brief_title: Angiographic Characteristics CSC , PCV Patients Thrombotic Bio-markers
DOC.criteria: CSC neurosensory detachment optical coherence tomography ( OCT ) focal leakage fluorescein angiography ( FAG ) and/or late choroidal hyperpermeability indocyanine green angiography ( ICGA ) PCV subretinal and/or subretinal pigment epithelial fluid OCT branching vascular network and/or polyp ICGA Control epiretinal membrane ( ERM ) without underlie systemic , ophthalmic disease ERM Previous history use steroid ( oral , topical ) Previous history CSC/PCV Previous history evidence intraocular inflammation include uveitis Coexisting retinal choroidal diseases History allergic reaction fluorescein indocyanine green dye Underlying systemic condition could affect thrombotic profile ( e.g . diabetes , hypertension , metabolic syndrome , coronary artery disease , cerebrovascular disease , stroke , chronic renal failure , current smoker , pregnancy , sleep disorder )
